hero.headline: Hi, I'm Nicolás Vela, a Digital Craftsman and I love creating new things!

bio.detail:
I’m a _Digital Craftsman_: a full-stack developer and software designer with 19+ years of experience building clean, scalable, and user-centric solutions.

My expertise spans **front-end architecture** (design systems, custom CSS frameworks, advanced UI/UX, 3D experiences with Three.js) and **back-end engineering** (Azure, .NET, Node.js, DevOps pipelines, cloud infrastructure). I bridge **design sensitivity and engineering rigor**, ensuring code quality matches user experience.

Beyond tech, I’m also a **creative and entrepreneur**: I produce music, design comics, and drive community-focused art projects in Galápagos. This mix allows me to see technology not just as code, but as a way to **tell stories, solve problems, and create cultural impact**.

  

I like to describe myself simply:

   

- 🚀 I build robust and scalable systems
- 🎨 I design clean, usable interfaces
- 🌱 I create artistic and community projects
